item.title: Install dotnet localhost SSL certificate for development
item.description: Goal Eliminate SSL certificate warnings when running dotnet applications on localhost during development. Install and trust the certificate dotnet dev-certs https --trust Confirm when the system prompt appears. Verify Restart your browser and navigate to your application (e.g., https://localhost:5001). The SSL warning should be gone.
